thread.title: Mike Will Made-It Taps Kendrick Lamar, Rihanna for 'Ransom 2' LP
thread.title_full: Mike Will Made-It Taps Kendrick Lamar, Rihanna for 'Ransom 2' LP

title: Mike Will Made-It Taps Kendrick Lamar, Rihanna for 'Ransom 2' LP
text:
Mike Will Made-It has unveiled a host of artist collaborations for his forthcoming Ransom 2 . As Rap-Up reports, the 17-song track list includes Kendrick Lamar, Rihanna, Future and many more big names. Related Mike WiLL Made It Has a New Solo LP in the Works 'Bangerz' producer details current projects at Pre-Grammy Gala red carpet 
The producer teased the sequel to his 2014 Ransom release by unveiling the album's guests via a Star Wars -styled video. The clip lists the aforementioned artists along with Pharrell, Rae Sremmurd, Gucci Mane, Young Thug, Big Sean, Lil Wayne, 2 Chainz, Migos, 21 Savage and Lil Yachty. He also unveiled that Ransom 2 will be available for pre-order beginning at midnight on Thursday. #RANSOM2 Pre-Order tonight at midnight.Album drop 3/24 pic.twitter.com/iDVYYE1dct — Mike Will (@MikeWiLLMadeIt) March 16, 2017 
Earlier in the week, he played music from the new set for Rick Rubin. "It's interesting 'cause it's like regular, but highest level. You know what I'm saying?," Rubin comments in a clip Mike Will Made-It posted on Instagram. "It's like – it's not like, you know how Kanye will do something and you've never heard it before? This doesn't sound like that. This sounds like, 'OK, we know what this is.' Best version of it. It's great." A post shared by Mike Will (@mikewillmadeit) on Mar 15, 2017 at 8:14pm PDT 
The LP includes Mike Will Made-It's recently released single " Gucci on My ," which features Migos, YG and 21 Savage. Ransom 2 will be available on March 24th. 
Ransom 2 Track List 
1. "On the Come Up" featuring Big Sean 2. "W Y O (What You on)" featuring Young Thug 3. "Hasselhoff" featuring Lil Yachty 4. "Gucci on My" featuring 21 Savage, YG and Migos 5. "Oh Hi Hater (Hiatus)" featuring Fortune 6. "Perfect Pint" featuring Kendrick Lamar, Gucci Mane and Rae Sremmurd 7. "Razzle Dazzle" featuring Future 8. "Bars of Soap" featuring Swae Lee 9. "Burnin'" featuring Andrea 10. "Y'all Ain't Ready" featuring 2 Chainz 11. "Aries (YuGo)" featuring Pharrell and Station Wagon P 12. "Emotions Unlocked" featuring Eearz 13. "Big God" featuring Trouble and Problem 14. "Faith" featuring Lil Wayne and Hoodybaby 15. "Come Down" featuring Chief Keef and Rae Sremmurd 16. "Outro" 17. "Nothing is Promised" featuring Rihanna More News
